explains: adj. 鲁莽的，不计后果的；粗心大意的
wordGroup: reckless driving 鲁莽驾驶；驾驶疏忽

sentences.en: She was a good rider, but reckless.
sentences.cn: 她是个好骑手，但太鲁莽。

sentences.en: He showed a reckless disregard for his own safety.
sentences.cn: 他对个人安危全然无所顾忌。

sentences.en: Many people believe reckless drivers are treated too leniently.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为对鲁莽的司机处理得太宽大了。
